# scout-stack

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                        | Type                                         | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `direction` | `direction` | The direction of the stack.                        | `"column" \| "row"`                          | `"row"` |
| `gapSize`   | `gap-size`  | Gap size. If more sizes are needed, we can expand. | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| "xxl"` | `"m"`   |
